fix: return highest quality thumbnail from YouTube API

- Fixed thumbnail selection to return first thumbnail (highest quality) instead of last
- Added support for snake_case video_details paths
- Added comprehensive debug logging to track thumbnail sources
- Handles multiple possible thumbnail locations from YouTube API

Resolves issue where lowest quality thumbnails were being returned.

- Core video editing functionality intact
